summary.span: 在类型的不同实例之间共享属性、资源和事件处理程序。

span.span: Enables the sharing of properties, resources, and event handlers between instances of a type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以在从或派生的任何元素上设置。You can set a on any element that derives from or . 样式最常声明为节内的资源。A style is most commonly declared as a resource inside the section. 由于样式是资源, 因此它们遵循适用于所有资源的相同范围规则, 因此, 声明样式会影响其应用位置。Because styles are resources, they obey the same scoping rules that apply to all resources, so where you declare a style affects where it can be applied. 例如, 如果在应用程序定义[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]文件的根元素中声明样式, 则该样式可用于应用程序中的任何位置。If, for instance, you declare the style in the root element of your application definition [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file, the style can be used anywhere in your application. 如果正在创建导航应用程序并在应用程序的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]一个文件中声明样式, 则该样式仅可用于该[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]文件。If you are creating a navigation application and declare the style in one of the application's [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] files, the style can be used only in that [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file. 有关资源的范围规则的详细信息, 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。For more information on scoping rules for resources, see [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). 样式声明包含一个对象, 该对象包含一个或多个对象的集合。The style declaration consists of a object that contains a collection of one or more objects. 每个都包含一个和一个。Each consists of a and a . 属性是样式要应用到的元素的属性的名称。The property is the name of the property of the element the style is to apply to. 将样式声明为资源后, 就可以像引用任何其他资源一样对其进行引用。After the style is declared as a resource, it can then be referenced just like any other resource. > [!NOTE] > 如果 setter 集合中有多个具有相同属性值的 setter, 则使用最后声明的 setter。If there is more than one setter in the setter collection with the same property value, the setter that is declared last is used. 同样, 如果为样式中的相同属性和直接在元素上设置了值, 则直接在元素上设置的值优先。Similarly, if you set a value for the same property in a style and on an element directly, the value set on the element directly takes precedence. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]样式设置和模板化模型允许维护和共享外观, 并使展示与逻辑分离。The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] styling and templating model allows maintenance and sharing of a look as well as the separation of presentation and logic. 样式设置和模板化模型包含一套功能, 使你能够自定义[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]你的。The styling and templating model includes a suite of features that enable you to customize your [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 此功能套件包括类以及以下内容:This suite of features includes the class as well as the following: - - 和 and - - 有关详细信息，请参阅[样式设置和模板化](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示将影响的属性的样式声明。The following example shows a style declaration that will affect the property of a . [!code-xaml[StyleOvw01#StyleSimple](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StyleOvw01/CS/Page1.xaml#stylesimple)] 若要应用以上样式, 请执行以下操作:To apply the above style, do the following: [!code-xaml[StyleOvw01#StyleSimpleApplied](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StyleOvw01/CS/Page1.xaml#stylesimpleapplied)] 还可以通过使用属性将样式应用于给定类型的所有元素。You can also apply styles to all elements of a given type by using the property. 将目标类型添加到样式意味着不再需要完全限定使用`ClassName.PropertyName`语法设置的属性。Adding the target type to the style means that you no longer have to fully qualify the property you are setting with the `ClassName.PropertyName` syntax. 下面的示例定义了将应用于每个元素的样式。The following example defines a style that will be applied to every element. [!code-xaml[PhotoStoreDemoStyled#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PhotoStoreDemoStyled/CS/window1.xaml#1)] > [!NOTE] > 许多[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]控件包含其他[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]控件的组合, 因此, 创建适用于某个类型的所有控件的样式可能会产生很大的影响。Many [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] controls consist of a combination of other [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] controls, so creating a style that applies to all controls of a type can have broad impact. 例如, 如果您创建一个样式, 该样式面向 中的控件, 则该样式将应用于画布中的所有控件, 即使是另一个控件(例如) 的一部分。For instance, if you create a style that targets the controls in a , the style is applied to all controls in the canvas, even if the is part of another control, such as a . 有关如何从定义的样式扩展或继承的信息, 请参阅页。For information on how to extend or inherit from a defined style, see the page.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个作为当前样式的基准的已定义样式。

span.span: Gets or sets a defined style that is the basis of the current style.

value.span: 一个作为当前样式的基准的已定义样式。

span.span: A defined style that is the basis of the current style.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个样式仅支持一个值。Each style only supports one value. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *myStyle**myStyle* 现有样式。An existing style. 通常, 使用[标记扩展和 WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/markup-extensions-and-wpf-xaml.md)来引用现有样式。Typically, you use the [Markup Extensions and WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/markup-extensions-and-wpf-xaml.md) to refer to an existing style. ## Examples 可以通过多种方式来扩展或[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]继承中的样式。There are several ways that styles in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] can be extended or inherited. 样式可基于通过此属性的其他样式。Styles can be based on other styles through this property. 使用此属性时, 新样式将继承未在新样式中显式重新定义的原始样式的值。When you use this property, the new style will inherit the values of the original style that are not explicitly redefined in the new style. 在下面的示例中`Style2` , 继承的值`Yellow`, 并添加值`Blue`。In the following example, `Style2` inherits the value of `Yellow`, and adds a value of `Blue`. [!code-xaml[StyleOvw01#ExtendingStyle](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StyleOvw01/CS/Page1.xaml#extendingstyle)] 同样, 样式可以基于现有[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]元素的样式, 如下面的示例所示, 其中新样式基于元素的样式。Similarly, styles can be based on the style of an existing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element, as in the following example where the new style is based on the style of a element. [!code-xaml[PhotoStoreDemoStyled#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PhotoStoreDemoStyled/CS/window1.xaml#2)] > [!NOTE] > 如果创建了一个具有属性的样式, 并将其基于另一个同时定义属性的样式, 则派生样式的目标类型必须与基样式的类型相同或派生。If you create a style with a property and base it on another style that also defines a property, the target type of the derived style must be the same as or be derived from the type of the base style. 为特定类型定义的样式也可以基于其他样式, 如以下示例中所示。Styles defined for specific types can also be based on other styles, as in the following example. [!code-xaml[StyleOvw01#ExtendingStyleTargetType](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StyleOvw01/CS/Page1.xaml#extendingstyletargettype)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象的属性只能包含可分配给的对象。The property of a object can consist only of objects assignable to . 将子对象添加到对象会将该子级隐式添加到对象的。 Adding a child to a object implicitly adds it to the for the object. 的显式属性元素用法也相对较常见。An explicit property element usage for is also relatively common. 这是一种标记样式决策, 有时有助于区分 复杂样式中的和项。This is a markup style decision that can sometimes help distinguish from and items in a complex style. 例如:For example: ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreSetters**oneOrMoreSetters* 一个或多个或对象。One or more or objects. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性。The following example shows how to use this property. summary.span: 获取或设置此样式所针对的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type for which this style is intended.
The target type for this style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以对从或派生的任何元素设置样式。You can set a style on any element that derives from or . 因此, 目标类型可以是这些元素中的任何一个。Therefore, your target type can be any of those elements. 但是, 如果您创建一个具有属性的样式, 并基于另一个同时定义属性的样式, 则该派生样式的目标类型必须与基样式的目标类型相同或派生。However, if you create a style with a property and base it on another style that also defines a property, the target type of the derived style must be the same as or be derived from the target type of the base style. 如果未指定, 则必须`x:Key`为指定, 还应使用类名称限定样式中的属性。If you do not specify a , then you must specify an `x:Key` for your and also qualify the properties in your style with a class name. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 样式设置和模板化模型使你能够在中指定触发器。 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] styling and templating model enables you to specify triggers within your . 实质上, 触发器是使你能够在满足某些条件时应用更改 (例如, 当某个属性值变为`true`或发生事件时) 的对象。Essentially, triggers are objects that enable you to apply changes when certain conditions (such as when a certain property value becomes `true`, or when an event occurs) are satisfied. ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreTriggers**oneOrMoreTriggers* 零个或多个是派生自的类的对象元素。Zero or more object elements that are classes deriving from . ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一个名为的可用于控件的。The following example shows a named available to controls. `true` 定义一个元素, 该元素在属性为时更改按钮的属性。 The defines a element that changes the property of a button when the property is `true`. [!code-xaml[BtnStyles#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BtnStyles/CS/app.xaml#2)]
